title: Rebecca Scheiner
text: Rebecca Scheiner is a German <a href="stage%20director">stage director</a>; she directs <a href="opera">opera</a>s and <a href="musicals">musicals</a>. She has worked at the <a href="Vienna%20State%20Opera">Vienna State Opera</a> and with the <a href="Vienna%20Boys%27%20Choir">Vienna Boys' Choir</a>.
